properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 9:40AM CST until January 8 at 10:12AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam...

.Rises continue along the Tombigbee River following the heavy rain
of Wednesday night and Thursday...and a flood warning remains in
effect along the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* from this afternoon to Wednesday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 9:15 AM Friday the stage was 98.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 101 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this afternoon and
continue to rise to near 105.9 feet by Sunday afternoon. The
river will fall then begin to fall and drop below flood stage by
Tuesday night.
* Impact...At 109 feet...Flooding of some camps and cabins...as well
as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural lands...
occurs, especially ustream of the lock and dam. At 101
feet...Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the
area occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
